channel.title: New account
channel.description:
[center]As for now this is going to be my skiller until I get all the levels up decently.[/center] [center][IMG]http://img229.imageshack.us/img229/5305/33315440ac6.th.jpg[/img][/center] [center]Short-term goals: wc, fm, cooking, fishing, mining, smithing up to at least 40
str,def,attk,hp,prayer,mage,and range to 30[/center]
[center]Long-term goals: wc, fm cooking fishing, mining smithing to 75+
str,def,attk,hp to 70+ mage and range to 60+ prayer to at least 45[/center]
[center]Eventually, I will make this my main account, although I already have a level 80 (brownieman02). But I'm going to make this account my main on the basis that the name I chose for it is unique.[/center]
EDIT: It may sound a little immature, but any donations would be greatly accepted, mainly since I've seen so many other people ask for them and recieve something, no matter how small it is... I really only need donations in terms of runes for mage. I have plenty of melee and ranged items for my noob account.
